title: Frequency Cap
description: Frequency capping settings for package-level application. Two types of frequency control can be used independently or together: suppress_minutes enforces a cooldown between consecutive exposures; max_impressions + per + window caps total exposures per entity in a time window.

suppress_minutes.description: Cooldown period in minutes between consecutive exposures to the same entity. Prevents back-to-back ad delivery (e.g., 60 = at least 1 hour between impressions).

max_impressions.description: Maximum number of impressions per entity per window. Caps total exposure over a rolling time period.

per.description: Entity granularity for impression counting. Required when max_impressions is set.

window.description: Time window for the max_impressions cap. Duration string (e.g., '1h', '6h', '1d', '7d', '30d', 'campaign'). 'campaign' applies the cap across the full campaign flight. Required when max_impressions is set.
